sentences.cn: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

sentences.en: And if he keeps a mistress , doesn't he have to support two households?
sentences.cn: 重婚不要两处开销 么 ?

sentences.en: Households accumulate wealth across a broad spectrum of assets.
sentences.cn: 家庭在以各种各样的资产形式积累财富。

sentences.en: How many households in the compound?
In 1990, 25% of households were of this type.
Just 26 per cent of households are married couples with dependent children.
sentences.cn: 只有26%的家庭是有孩子要扶养的已婚夫妇。

sentences.en: Many households have dispensed with their old-fashioned vinyl turntable.
sentences.cn: 很多家庭都将老式的黑胶唱机束之高阁了。

sentences.en: Many poor households are experiencing real hardship.
sentences.cn: 很多贫穷家庭正经历严重的困难。

sentences.en: More than half of all households report incomes above £35,000.
sentences.cn: 半数以上的家庭申报收入超过35,000英镑。

sentences.en: Most households now own at least one car.
sentences.cn: 大多数家庭现在至少有一辆汽车。

sentences.en: Only a third of these households thought it reasonable to meter water.
sentences.cn: 这些家庭当中只有三分之一认为用水表计量是合理的。

sentences.en: Other households had found her too talkative and too opinionated, forever giving pelf mysterious airs.
sentences.cn: 在别处,有人嫌她太张道, 主意多,时常有些神眉鬼道儿的.

sentences.en: The whole households were up early.
There are thirty households in the village.
Very few households in Rangli kept their doors open; the shops naturally all remained closed.
sentences.cn: 让里的人家很少有开门的, 店铺自然更不用说,路上时时有兵士经过.

sentences.en: We must respect farmer households as market players and encourage innovation in the rural management system.
sentences.cn: 尊重农户的市场主体地位,推动农村经营体制创新.

words.tran_cn: 家庭；拆迁户；家户（household的复数）

phrases.tran_cn: 家庭收入；家庭总入息；住户收入
家喻户晓的人；家喻户晓的事
家喻户晓的单词；众所周知的词

trans.tran_cn: 同住在一所房子里的人，一家人，户( household的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house
